name: Asteroids Ahead: Double Trouble
description:
Go Deep And Deeper Into The Space And Discover It's Secrets..

Control

  • Press "Space" To fly Up.
  • Press 'A' and 'D' to steer Left or Right.
  • Press 'W' To Shoot Bullets (In Endless Mode, player will have the access to the gun where in Campaign mode player have to buy the Gun to Shoot..

Gameplay

There are two deferent modes in this game. First campaign mode where player have to upgrade his ship and fly into the space by dodging traps and shooting down enemies. In Endless mode, player will be experience endless space with endless traps and enemies. 

Thank You For Playing, Please give your thoughts on this game. It will help me to do better in future.
